attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is know need for the Euro. This great country has always done perfectly well without the same currency as other countries. Sign this petition to save this part of Great Britain. We need to show this government that there are plenty of people in this country that are saying NO TO THE EURO. Say no and stand up for your right to have a country to be proud of.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
